snippet: The Royal Opera House in London has announced that part of its lineup from the 2013-14 season will be simulcast for the first time in more than 500 movie theaters in the United States.
abstract: Royal Opera House in London announces that part of its lineup from the 2013-14 season will be simulcast for the first time in more than 500 movie theaters in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The Royal Opera House in London has announced that part of its lineup from the 2013-14 season will be simulcast for the first time in more than 500 movie theaters in the United States.

headline.main: Royal Opera House Plans Simulcasts in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Royal Opera House Plans Simulcasts in U.S.
